name: Greek-Style Lemon Roasted Potatoes
author: koko
summary: A great complement with souvlaki. I often cook this on the BBQ with the souvlaki. All you need is a great Greek salad for a full meal!
ingredients: 3 pounds potatoes, peeled and cut into thick wedges
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Put potato wedges into a large bowl
Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice over the wedges and toss to coat
Season potatoes with salt, oregano, and black pepper; toss again to coat
Spread potato wedges in a single layer in a 2 inch-deep pan
Pour chicken broth over the potatoes
Roast potatoes in preheated oven until tender and golden brown, about 1 hour
